BANNER.TITLE: Make Business Flow Easyer With Us
BANNER.DESCRIPTION: Your amazing product deserves an easy way to manage it. Our app will provide you with a nessesary instruments no matter what your idea is about.

FEATURETEXT.TITLE: A complete feature stack ready to help you
FEATURETEXT.DESCRIPTION: This application will help you to achieve the set goals for an individual in a team or group of developers.

CARDS.TITLE: Itâ€™s free
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: You can use all the functions of the application absolutely free: no trial periods and bank card binding

CARDS.TITLE: Easy UI
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: The application interface is designed to make it as easy as possible to interact with it and make everything intuitive.

CARDS.TITLE: Available for all team
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: All of your teammates have access to all data on the current state of development of your project. In addition, each participant has the opportunity to edit them.

CARDS.TITLE: For all devices
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: The application is adapted for the screens of tablets and mobile phones, so you can find out what your team is doing at any time and in any place.

VIDEO.TITLE: Watch how to use the app

TEAMS.TITLE: Our perspective team
TEAMS.DESCRIPTION: A team of three people worked on the development of the application: students of the Angular framework course from RSSchool under the close supervision of the curator - zheromskyV

TEAMMATE.NAME: Tanya
TEAMMATE.DESCRIPTION: Implemented the functionality of user authorization and registration, editing his personal information and deleting an account, a global search for all tasks, the ability to edit column and board titles, tests for different Angular entities.

TEAMMATE.NAME: Evgenia
TEAMMATE.DESCRIPTION: Deploy backend, worked out the page with the list of boards, implemented adding/removing/creating boards, columns and shuffles. Also developed a storage for boards.

TEAMMATE.NAME: Andrey
TEAMMATE.DESCRIPTION: Creating the main page, header, and basement. Layout of components of columns and cards. Implementation of drag&drop and other minor improvements.

USER.NAME: Name*
USER.PASSWORD_ERROR_UPPER: a mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters
USER.PASSWORD_ERROR_NUMBER: a mixture of letters and numbers
